header.title: Find Civil Service Jobs
header.betaText: This part of GOV.UK is being rebuilt

messages.locationRequired: You need to enter a location
messages.invalidRadius: You need to enter a valid radius
messages.invalidMinSalary: You need to enter a valid min salary
messages.invalidMaxSalary: You need to enter a valid max salary

global.cookies: GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler. Find out more about cookies

page.title: Job search
page.subtitle: Search and apply for jobs within the Civil Service and central government organisations

language.statement: This service is also available in Welsh
language.label: Cymraeg

page.title: Search results
page.noResultsText1: There are no results to match your search options

page.cscBodyLine1: The Civil Service Code sets out the standards of behaviour expected of civil servants.
page.cscBodyLine2: We recruit by merit on the basis of fair and open competition, as outlined in the Civil Service Commission's recruitment principles.
page.cscBodyLine3: The Civil Service embraces diversity and promotes equality of opportunity. There is a guaranteed interview scheme (GIS) for candidates with disabilities who meet the minimum selection criteria.

nationalityStatement.title: Nationality requirements
nationalityStatement.nonreserved: Open to UK, Commonwealth and European Economic Area (EEA) and certain non EEA nationals. Further information on whether you are able to apply is available in our nationality rules document.

page.title: Cookies
page.p1: We put small files (known as ‘cookies’) onto your computer to collect information about how you browse the site.
page.p3_li1: measure how you use the website so it can be updated and improved based on your needs
page.p3_li2: remember the notifications you’ve seen so that we don’t show them to you again
page.p3_li3: remember who you are when you have logged in so we can show you your information
page.p4: Find out more about how to manage cookies.
page.p5: We use Google Analytics software to collect information about how you use. We do this to help make sure the site is meeting the needs of its users and to help us make improvements, for example improving site search.
page.p6_li2: how long you spend on each page
page.p6_li3: how you got to the site
page.p6_li4: what you click on while you’re visiting
page.p7: We don’t collect or store your personal information (for example your name or address) so this information can’t be used to identify who you are.
page.p8: Google Analytics sets the following cookies:
page.t1_r1c2: This helps us count how many people visit GOV.UK by tracking if you’ve visited before
page.t1_r2c2: This helps us count how many people visit GOV.UK by tracking if you’ve visited before
page.t1_r3c2: Used to manage the rate at which page view requests are made
page.t2_r1c2: To allow us to fire events once per user session
page.t2_r2c2: To allow us to fire events once per day
page.p9: You can opt out of Google Analytics cookies.
page.t3_label_l2: You will see a pop-up welcome message when you first visit us. We’ll store a cookie so that your computer knows you’ve seen it and knows not to show it again.
page.t3_r1c2: Saves a message to let us know that you’ve seen our cookie message
page.t4_label_l2: You are able to set your language preference to English or Welsh. We use a cookie to display text in your prefered language.
page.t4_r1c2: Saves a message to let us remember your language preference
page.t5_r1c2: Lets us know how many results to display per page
page.p10: Most services we link to are run by different government departments, for example Cabinet Office or the HM Treasury. These services may set additional cookies and, if so, will have their own cookies policy.
